contentrichtext.text: '''Yapi Kredi Publications''' ({{lang-tr|Yap覺 Kredi Yay覺nlar覺}}) is one of the biggest [[Publisher|publishing houses]] in [[Turkey]]. Based in [[Istanbul]] and active since 1992, it has published nearly 2500 titles in philosophy, literature, the arts, and children's books. It is a member of the [[Turkish Publishers Association]].<ref>[[Turkish Publishers Association]], [http://www.turkyaybir.org.tr/member/yapi-kredi-publishing-co/503 Yap覺 Kredi Publishing Co]</ref> ==References== <references/> ==External links== * [http://www.ykykultur.com.tr YKY] Official Yapi Kredi Publishing website [[Category:Publishing companies of Turkey]] [[Category:Media companies of Turkey]] [[Category:Media in Istanbul]] [[Category:Book publishing companies of Turkey]] {{Turkey-stub}} {{publish-corp-stub}}
